summary: This document is an overdraft notice from Fifth Third Bank addressed to Scio Verum Corporation, detailing an overdraft situation on their account. It outlines the account's balance, transactions that contributed to the overdraft, and provides information on fees and customer service contact details.

persons.name: Helene Tolentino
persons.context: Helene Tolentino is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account in question.

persons.name: P. Brian Moore
persons.context: P. Brian Moore is the Senior Vice President who signed the overdraft notice.

events.title: Account Overdraft
events.description: The account was overdrawn by $3,227.64 due to withdrawals exceeding the available balance.

keyFacts: The account was overdrawn on July 10, 2014, by $3,227.64.
Fifth Third Bank waived $74.00 in overdraft fees as a courtesy.
The beginning balance on July 10, 2014, was $15,785.39.
Total withdrawals on that date amounted to $19,013.03.
The document includes contact information for customer service and mentions alternative banking products.
